backend.title: Remote .NET Mid Backend Developer ⚙️
backend.description:
Offer description Who are we? 🤔


a global team with high standards - we maintain Silicon Valley quality and vibe, even though we have spread far beyond 


we've made a real difference in the world since 2008! We deliver for Zoetis, Apple, Tesla, NATO, UNICEF, and many more 


75-people-sized A-Team in Wrocław, with other offices in the US, UK, and India




💪🏼 We care about your growth… 


you will sense a knowledge-exchange culture from Day 1 - workshops, meetups, hackathons, or coffee machine meetings - we inspire each other on a daily basis 💡


training, courses, workshops, and conferences of your choice will be covered by Kellton


you won’t get stuck within one area - we’ll make sure that you’ll be challenged with various types of projects. Just look up our case studies!


you’ll work in an international and multicultural environment on a daily basis 🌎


aspiring to become a full-stack or just willing to broaden your knowledge? Cross-team work will let you learn and help other departments


free English lessons twice a week - with us you will take your language skills to the next level 🇬🇧


🧘🏻‍♀️ …well-being...


20 days of paid time off on a B2B 🏝


ever wondered how will bar, office, and dev-cave basement look combined? That’s our office aka the best and natural habitat for devs (can be outranked only by your home office)


multiple food benefits: home-ordered meals if you work remotely, in-office lunches, a kitchen full of snacks and drinks, and many more 🍱


of course, we do provide Multisport Card


💆🏼‍♀️ …and ease of mind. 


we insure your life and health with personalized insurance and private healthcare


create a practical, unique, and comfy workspace with our 1.5K PLN home-office bonus 🏡




🙌🏻 Clear recruitment process:
1. Introductory meeting 🤜🏼🤛🏼 - we are a close-knit team, and getting to know each other is our priority! 
2. A meeting with the project management team.
3. Technical screening ⚙️ 
4. A meeting with your future manager. 🤝 read more

backend.title: Backend Developer
backend.description: Offer description We are currently looking for a Backend Developer for our international project in the IT Delivery Centre, is the bank's internal project.

backend.title: Senior Python Developer z wiedzą bio/ chem...
backend.description:
Offer description  Original text.   Show translation Jesteśmy software housem z Wrocławia, działającym na rynku od 2013 roku. Cechuje nas niekorporacyjna atmosfera pracy, która daje swobodę działania, dużą samodzielność i realny wpływ na podejmowane decyzje. Kładziemy duży nacisk na samoorganizację, tworzymy miejsce dla osób samodzielnych, które cenią transparentność i nie boją się przyjmować odpowiedzialności.
Poszukujemy python developerów z wiedzą domenową w zakresie chemii / biologii oraz najlepiej cheminformatics lub bioinformatics. Specjalizujemy się w budowaniu dedykowanych rozwiązań w branży life science. Skupiamy się głównie na rozwoju aplikacji webowych oraz pracy w backendzie.
Umiejętności wymagane:

Python
Git
Chemia / biologia
Rozwiązywanie problemów/Krytyczne myślenie
Proaktywność
Bardzo dobry angielski
Bardzo dobry polski

Umiejętności dodatkowe:

Cheminformatics / bioinformatics
Django
Angular/React
Node.js
REST
GraphQL
Docker
Linux
PostgreSQL
RDKit
Marvin
Smiles, smarts

Oferujemy:

17000 - 23 500 PLN netto (B2B), w zależności od seniority, tech stacku oraz weryfikacji umiejętności technicznych
Forma umowy: B2B, poszukujemy osób do stałej współpracy, nie tylko do projektu
pracę w pełni zdalną
rozwój w innowacyjnym projekcie z obszaru life science
zespół ekspertów otwartych na feedback
całkowitą transparentność - przychody firmy, stawki dla klientów oraz wynagrodzenia wszystkich współpracowników są jawne dla każdego w firmie
Rozpoczęcie pracy: do ustalenia

Proces rekrutacyjny (online):
1️⃣ Rozmowa telefoniczna (max 15 minut)
2️⃣ Rozmowa z HRem (60 min)
3️⃣ Live coding z jednym z naszych developerów (60 min)
4️⃣ Zadanie techniczne dla wybranych kandydatów, którzy pozytywnie przejdą live coding 
5️⃣ Decyzja (feedback niezależnie od wyniku) read more

backend.title: Senior C# Developer
backend.description:
Offer description About Code Poets:
The name "Code Poets" reflects our deep appreciation for the artistry of programming.Software development is not just about writing lines of code but also about crafting elegant and creative solutions to complex problems.Our developers are like poets, using their skills and creativity to turn abstract ideas into functional, beautiful, and impactful digital products.
About the project:Our client  is a pioneer in the field of Multi-Organ-Chip technology and has been driving innovations in biotechnology since  2010. Their commercially available HUMIMIC Multi-Organ-Chips provide a unique opportunity to biologically model the  complexity of human organs and their interactions. Using cutting-edge technology in combination with robotics  and artificial intelligence enables informed decisions in the drug development process. At the same time, by using  human tissue, it reduces the dependency on animal testing and rationalizes clinical studies, offering the potential for cheaper medicines for all.  Main Responsibilities:✔️ Development of planning and analysis software for automation systems ✔️ Design and implementation of distributed software systems ✔️ Collaboration in an interdisciplinary team to translate TissUse's needs and requirements into software solutions
Requirements ✔️ Backend development experience, e.g. with C# or NodeJS ✔️ Excellent knowledge of C# or an equivalent object-oriented programming language ✔️ Experience with frontend web frameworks such as Angular and VueJS ✔️ Good knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript ✔️ Familiarity with database systems e.g. MSSQL or SQLite ✔️ Knowledge of working with Linux and Windows servers ✔️ Good communication skills in German and/or English (both written and spoken) ✔️ Experience with multi-platform frameworks such as Electron is advantageous ✔️ Experience in agile software development is desirable 
What we offer:💸 PLN 18 - 22000 net (B2B), depending on seniority, tech stack and verification of technical skills at the interview📃 Form of contract: B2B, we are looking for people for long-term cooperation, not only for the project🌍 Working remotely most of the time, but this job includes business trips to Berlin, especially in the onboarding time🔴 Development in an innovative project in the field of life science🟢 The team of experts open to feedback🔵 Total transparency within the company⏰ Start of work: to be discussed  Recruitment process (online):1️⃣ Phone call screening (max 15 minutes)2️⃣ HR interview (60 minutes)3️⃣ Live coding with one of our developers (60 minutes)4️⃣ Interview with the client 5️⃣ Decision read more

backend.title: PHP Software Development Internship
backend.description:
Offer description PROEXE has operated since 2013 in the mobile/web interactive solutions market. We have been part of the largest private capital group in Poland - VECTRA since 2020. Due to the dynamic development, we are looking for MidUX/UI Designer to support us in new projects and challenges.
We offer

Work in our office in Warsaw (near Dworzec Zachodni) or remotely
The chance to advance and evolve while being guided by experienced Testers and Team Leaders
a highly extensive knowledge base, including training videos related to testing or using testing tools
Technical equipment provided by us

What is the recruitment process for this position?

Please fill in the form provided by us. It will take you about 5 minutes to complete it.
If your application matches our offer, we send you a simple task to confirm your skills.
If the task is done correctly, we arrange a meeting with our Team Leader. This type of conversation usually takes about 30 minutes
The next step is meeting with the Team Leader and one more person from the QA Team. This type of conversation usually takes about 60 minutes.
If both conversations with the Team Leader is successful, welcome onboard!
 read more

backend.description:
Offer description NIX Tech, a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services, is looking for a Medior Python Backend Developer in its office in Budapest (Vaci Greens, 13th district). You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
WHAT WE OFFER:

Stable long-term work environment
Private health insurance (Medicover)
Comfortable office in Budapest (Vaci Greens)
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our friendly team

backend.title: Senior Software Engineer, Relay
backend.description:
Offer description **Our compensation structure is the base salary and equity in the form of restricted stock units.
Senior Software Engineer, Relay
What is Box?
Box is the market leader for Cloud Content Management. Our mission is to power how the world works together. Box is partnering with enterprise organizations to accelerate their digital transformation by creating a single platform for secure content management, collaboration, and workflow. We have an amazing opportunity to further establish ourselves as leaders in the space, and we need strong advocates to help us achieve that goal. 
By joining Box, you will have the unique opportunity to help capture a majority of this developing market and define what content management looks like for the digital enterprise. Today, Box powers 100,000+ businesses, including many top Fortune 500 companies, who trust our secure collaboration platform to manage the entire content lifecycle.Our Warsaw office is an incredibly exciting addition to our EMEA expansion. We're already in the UK, France, and Germany, and the new Poland location will act as a global engineering and product development hub alongside our headquarters in Redwood City, California.
Why Box needs you:
Many of the world's largest enterprises rely on Box to securely store their content, and we are helping to unlock the potential of their content through the development of additional core capabilities, like Box Relay. We are expanding Relay with additional features and supporting products.
Our Workflow team, based in Poland, works together to delight our users by enabling them to automate routine tasks. Our products save users time and deliver results in consistent manner. As our team in Poland continues to grow and take on building new product, we are looking for a seasoned engineer who can own large components of the system and work independently. In this role, your work will impact millions of users, who use Relay to get their work done on a daily basis.
Percentage of Time Spent:

55% coding
10% documentation
20% bug fixes
15% meetings

EQUAL OPPORTUNITY We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability, and any other protected ground of discrimination under applicable human rights legislation”. For details on how we protect your information when you apply, please see our Personnel Privacy Notice. For more details on how Box Poland protects your information, please see our Supplemental Personnel and Candidate Privacy Notice.  read more

frontend.title: Senior Frontend Developer
frontend.description:
Offer description About LegalZoom
We're here to make legal help accessible to all. LegalZoom transformed the legal industry with the launch of our online services and groundbreaking technology in 2001. Since then, millions of customers have counted on us to officially start and run businesses, protect brands and intellectualproperty, and look after loved ones through wills and trusts.
As the industry leader for over 20 years, innovation remains at the center of all we do. We're creative thinkers and problem solvers with a passion for building legal and tax products that make a positive impact on the world, and we're always looking for exceptional people to push us further. With us, you'll do work that's as rewarding as it is challenging with a team where every voice matters and diversity, equality, and inclusion are truly embraced. Together, we'll continue to democratize the law and make a real difference in the lives of millions.
Overview
Your work is consistently of high quality. You solve difficult problems, applying appropriate technologies and best practices. You work with your team to invent, design and build software that is stable and performant. You write code that an Software Development Engineer unfamiliar with the system can understand. Your solutions are pragmatic. You are proficient in a broad range of design approaches and know when it is appropriate to use them (and when it is not). You do things with the proper level of complexity the first time (or at least minimize incidental complexity). You consider the legacy of the code you produce, limiting the use of short-term workarounds. You create flexible software withoutover-engineering. You make appropriate trade-offs, re-use where possible, and are judicious about introducing dependencies. read more

frontend.title: Front-end Developer (Vue.js)
Front-end Developer
frontend.description:
Offer description  Original text.   Show translation O nas
Firma App Trend Sp. z o.o. specjalizuje się w systemach do raportowania finansowego ESEF oraz zrównoważonego rozwoju ESG tworząc systemy o nazwie Consolia.
W Polsce obsługuje ponad 60% emitentów raportujących się na GPW w standardzie InlineXBRL, co czyni go w tym segmencie liderem na rynku. Do klientów AppTrend zalicza się ponad 230 dużych podmiotów na GPW w Warszawie, 20 firm audytorskich i ponad 50 grup kapitałowych w Polsce o strategicznym znaczeniu dla polskiej gospodarki. AppTrend tworzy wydajne, bezpieczne i skalowalne systemy.
Na szczególną uwagę zasługuje szybki rozwój firmy i stabilna sytuacja. AppTrend wyznacza kierunek rozwoju w tworzeniu systemów korzystających z pogłębionej robotyzacji procesów biznesowych (RPA), pełnego zintegrowania z kompleksowymi modułami do sprawozdawczości i konsolidacji sprawozdań finansowych, agregacji danych niefinansowych oraz wsparcia księgowych i biegłych rewidentów za pomocą sztucznej inteligencji w procesie decyzyjnym i kontrolnym. read more

frontend.title: Software Engineer
frontend.description:
Offer description You will be joining our full stack team as a Budapest-based engineer to develop and maintain the Python/Django backend and React frontend of our educational marketplace.
You will have 1-2 calls per week typically at 17:00-18:00 CET with our California-based team, including the Hungarian CEO. You'll have flexible hours, huge independence and will help us in building our developer culture.

frontend.title: Senior Frontend Software Engineer
frontend.description:
Offer description What you’ll do at Jamf:
At Jamf, we empower people to be their best selves and do their best work. We are looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer to join our team to help us create, maintain and continually improve products that help our customers find success with the Apple platform.  
You will participate in an agile delivery team that produces and delivers new features and supports existing functionality with high quality and reliability. You will be a key component in Jamf remaining the best of breed in endpoint management of Apple devices.
Jamf is a fast-paced environment. Successful team members are adaptable to the change that is a part of software development. Our goal at Jamf is to ship the highest quality product to solve our customer's problems.  
This role is remote in Poland. We are only able to accept applications for those based in Poland and have sponsorship to live and work in Poland.
What you can expect to do in this role:

Break down customer problems into work you and the team can execute on
Independently complete tasks from start to finish with high quality
Ability to communicate technical concepts to stakeholders
Use your knowledge of Engineering best practices to ask the right questions, solve problems and build great software with a high level of quality
Produce designs for new and existing features
Clearly communicate technical concepts with others in the organization (Technical Communication, Support, Product and Cloud)
Performs all job responsibilities in alignment with the core values, mission and purpose of the organization
Adheres to the highest moral, ethical and legal standards to deliver and environment that promotes respect, innovation and creativity
Supports and promotes a positive, inclusive workplace one in which the talents and strengths of our increasingly diverse workforce are welcomed, further developed and manifested in our work.
 read more

frontend.title: Senior Frontend  Engineer (Angular)
frontend.description:
Offer description As a leader in Inpatient Journey Analytics, Kontakt.io optimizes processes and resources by revealing how patients, staff, and equipment move through your care delivery. Using AI, IoT, and RTLS, Kontakt.io helps health systems uncover waste, streamline capacity, improve workflows, and help patients and staff feel seen and valued.
Our portfolio of complete IoT and location solutions combine hardware, software, and cloud to bring real-time visibility, analytics, and AI to operations. Today, we serve over 2,000 customers across diverse sizes and industries, from transportation and logistics to manufacturing, healthcare, airports, governments and public spaces. They use Kontakt.io to reduce emergency incident time, decrease asset search-times, introduce activity-based-costing, automate manual processes, digitize physical order traceability or prevent machine downtimes read more

fullstack.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
fullstack.description:
Offer description  Original text.   Show translation Cześć! 👋 Nazywam się Jarek Pieczonka i razem ze wspólnikami już 15 lat temu rozkręciliśmy bardzo fajny biznes, który na dziś dzień jest niekwestionowanym liderem na rynku usług!
Razem z firmą rośnie ilość zadań, ich trudności, ale przede wszystkim oczekiwania Klientów, którym chcemy sprostać. Dlatego odpalam tę rekrutację, aby znaleźć do swojego zespołu prawdziwego wymiatacza, który razem ze mną, Liderami Technicznymi i resztą zespołu IT sprosta wszystkim oczekiwaniom, rozwiąże wszystkie wyzwania i wzniesie nas na wyższy poziom zarówno kodowania, jak i przyjemności korzystania z naszej aplikacji.

Projekt
Jeden produkt, wiele projektów
E-Commerce
Praca in house
Release’y co tydzień i będą częściej
80% nowe featuresy, 20% utrzymanie
Scrum (zespół ok.6 osób) współpracujący z innymi zespołami i liderami technicznymi
Serwery dedykowane oraz Cloud (AWS, Google, MS)
AI używane w projekcie i na co dzień (asystent, wtyczki w narzędziach)


Czyli —  Oferteo to serwis marketplace. Pomagamy nawiązywać kontakty firmom i osobom prywatnym poszukującym usług i produktów. Jesteśmy liderem branży, naszą stronę odwiedzają miliony użytkowników, z aplikacji mobilnej korzystają dziesiątki tysięcy osób. Programiści w Oferteo pracują in house, projektów, pomysłów i wyzwań jest dużo, ale zawsze jest ten sam produkt — platforma Oferteo 😉 Pracujemy w zwinnych i efektywnych zespołach stosując metodologię SCRUM. Każdy z członków zespołu: Developer, Tester, Product Owner czy nawet Scrum Master ma realny wpływ na rozwój aplikacji i wdrażane pomysły. Przez te wszystkie lata zmiany, które wprowadzamy, są zawsze z myślą USER FIRST. W naszym backlogu gromadzimy zarówno duże wyzwania, jak i mniejsze, ale nadal ważne i oczekiwane przez biznes oraz naszych Użytkowników.
⚙️ Formalności na koniec 

Pracujemy hybrydowo - 1 dzień w tygodniu w biurze, 4 dni zdalnie i na pewno mamy do siebie blisko, nasze biuro jest zaraz obok Dworca Głównego we Wrocławiu
Umowę zgodną z Twoimi oczekiwaniami
KUP 50 dla UoP
Bliska współpraca z biznesem i realny wpływa na wytwarzane rozwiązania
Szkolenia to u nas podstawa! Zaczynamy od pełnego wdrożenia, a później zadbamy o aktualizowanie Twojej wiedzy

fullstack.title: Senior Software Engineer
fullstack.description:
Offer description Working Environment:
With new cloud applications, we want to further increase the networking of our members and customers in the DATEV ecosystem. You will work on changing tasks in a modern DevOps team. Thereby you will use agile development methods and current technologies to develop a new generation of DATEV cloud applications. By DevOps, we don't just mean the simple use of tools or roles, but rather the team spirit, "we build it we run it". You will work closely with product teams and will be responsible with your team for a product for a certain period of time. We are interested in long-term employment relationships and look forward to you becoming an integral part of our team.
This is us:
DATEV is more than just a green square, we are one of Europe’s largest software and IT service providers, based in Nuremberg. The passion of our more than 8,500 employees is to help more than 500,000 customers on their way to digitalized business processes. 
Our customers rely on our cloud or on-premise solutions and our mobile apps, for example to process about 14 million payrolls every month.
As a cooperative we encourage collaboration. It focusses on our principles: Driving progress. Shaping the future. Achieving success together. We combine consistency with innovation. 
Diversity, equity and inclusion are the essential basis for us to ensure that everyone can participate equally in working life. DATEV takes responsibility for this matter every day. #WeareDATEV! 
We look forward to receiving your application using our career site and to getting to know you. 
Our Benefits:

Attractive payment ranges based on your qualification, experience, and skills as well as many other financial incentives (for example sharing the costs of sportive activities, private medical care, …).
Homeoffice in the sense of mobile, location-independent work within Poland including the corresponding technical equipment.
Learning possibilities and education related to advance your career and your personal skills, as well as numerous internal communities like a large internal community of software engineering professionals and opportunities to visit conferences as a speaker or attendee.
Long term employment contracts
We have a lot more to offer... do you want to find out? 😊
 read more

Nasz Partner to największa polska grupa ubezpieczeniowa z silną obecnością na rynkach międzynarodowych, koncentrująca się na innowacjach, transformacji cyfrowej i rozwijaniu nowoczesnych rozwiązań ubezpieczeniowych.

fullstack.title: Lead Full Stack Engineer ( .NET / React )
fullstack.description:
Offer description We are looking for an experienced, proactive Lead Full Stack Engineer (.NET/React) who has proven experience with e-commerce public operational web sites to join our development team.
Our customer–integrated Shipping Services have set itself apart as an independent carrier with a fresh, unique approach. His strategy as a global niche carrier offers distinctive advantages to customers worldwide. They have created an innovative, efficient network that ensures stable, reliable services; and we have made it their mission to focus on the needs of our customers, which stand at the heart of all our decisions. The main idea of our product is to operate in select trades, where it has a competitive advantage and where it can provide superior service. We maintain a flexible partnership approach with other major carriers, and our new line structure is a much-needed alternative to customers concerned about the current alliance-dominated market. read more

fullstack.title: Senior Fullstack Engineer (part-time)
fullstack.description:
Offer description We’re looking for a Senior Fullstack Engineer to join our team in Warsaw or remotely.
Sunscrapers is an elite Python development company that helps clients set up dedicated development teams in Poland, made of the most talented, experienced, and motivated software engineers.
Since 2010, we’ve been working with ambitious US and European scaleups, SMBs and enterprises on delivering digital products and extending in-house development teams.
We’ve earned our reputation by combining a passion for technology, the highest quality standards, and our unique ‘Product-Developer Fit’ hiring process.
We are looking for a Senior Fullstack Engineer to join one of our remote projects.

Our client provides cross-cultural training and consulting. Their main product is the e-learning platform, which provides information on culture and behavior in more than 160 countries. Companies and organizations worldwide use the platform to help employees develop cultural awareness and the ability to work with people from different cultures.
Currently, they are focusing on providing companies with data on how they compare to other companies in a given sector regarding inclusiveness.
The client is looking for an experienced programmer who can work independently and has experience working with non-technical founders. This person should also understand legacy code.

Important note: the estimated working time we have provided for the developer we want to hire is three months. read more

fullstack.title: Senior Fullstack Development Engineer
fullstack.description:
Offer description Remitly is on a mission to transform the lives of immigrants and their families by providing the most trusted financial products and services on the planet. Since 2011, we have been tirelessly delivering on our promises to immigrants sending their hard earned money home. Today, we are reimagining international payments at scale and building new products to create deeper relationships with our customers and their loved ones across the globe. Join over 2,700 employees across 10 offices who are growing their careers while having a positive impact on people globally.
Remitly is registered as a Money Services Business in the U.S., Canada, EU, United Kingdom, Singapore and Australia. Each of these jurisdictions require, among other items, that Remitly maintain a comprehensive Risk and Compliance Program.
About the RoleTo succeed in this role, you should enjoy being in a startup environment and working hands-on with engineers and product teams across the company. You'll be member of a team in Kraków, which is part of a bigger global team. You'll be reporting to an Engineering Manager. Our stack is backend micro-services with simple front-end applications for back-office needs. You will contribute to development to different elements of these applications. This will include building foundations for new UI and new backend components and sun setting existing UIs. This role is an opportunity to be involved in early stages of a product lifecycle.
Our Benefits

Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP)
Unlimited paid time off, subject to approval
min. 26 days paid holidays + additional Remitly days off
Royalties (KUP)
Hybrid or remote work arrangements with an office in a Kraków City Centre
Commuting to work expense/remote work expenses reimbursement
Health/Dental Coverage - LUX MED VIP for employee and family
Life Insurance
Travel insurance for employee and family
Sodexo Lunch Card/Multisport
Education / Conferences Budget
Equipment of your choice
Mental health program for employee and their dependents
Family planning program
Employee Pension Plan (PPK)
Headphones Reimbursement
Referral bonus scheme
 read more

fullstack.title: Engineering Manager
fullstack.description: Offer description Company DescriptionWe’re the world’s leading sports technology company, at the intersection between sports, media, and betting. More than 1,700 sports federations, media outlets, betting operators, and consumer platforms across 120 countries rely on our know-how and technology to boost their business.Job DescriptionBased in Wroclaw in PolandJob Type: Permanent Contract (UoP)OVERVIEW:Join our Data Acquisition Tribe and become a part of the global fast-growing success of Sportradar. A technology first software development company with high emphasis on achieving technical excellence and building services on best practice cloud principles. Mutually beneficial partnerships are the cornerstone of our business. We partner with the largest sport federations in the world including UEFA, NBA, NHL, MLB, ITF and many more.Our vision is built on long-term relationships with all our clients, backed by innovative and competitive services and solutions. We build our own product and believe in ‘you build it, you own it’, so we want to give our squads autonomy to choose the right solutions.THE CHALLENGE:Due to our success, we are continuously hiring motivated engineers and we want to ensure we scale our engineering leadership accordingly In Data Acquisition Tribe we create solutions to collect sports data globally for more than 60 different sports We want to build yet better solutions and we want to give you a real opportunity to influence design and technology choices. JOB PROFILE:We are looking for an engineering leader who loves working with both people and software. We expect that you, as a leader, are passionate about building an environment where software engineers can achieve their full potential. As an engineer, you have a great understanding of modern development techniques and can be a partner for the team to choose the best solutions. We expect that you can be an advocate of clean code, and clean architecture, TDD (Test Driven Development), pair programming and always welcome feedback. You will be given a lot of autonomy and we want you to use the most of it and drive the team towards technical excellence. We hope you feel learning is a natural part of your workday and you have a high interest in keeping up with current best practices in your areas of expertise. In the role you will:Lead a team of diverse and talented software engineers with various levels of expertise. Coach engineers to grow, by supporting and giving them frequent feedback, setting individual goals, and assessing performance. Facilitate technical discussions and help to make the best decisions. Be a member of the Tribe Engineering Leadership Team shaping the culture and engineering practices of the entire Tribe. Contribute to the code (we do not need you to be the best programmer in the team, but we believe in ‘walk the talk’ ) OUR OFFER:Work and develop within an inspiring and fast-growing company and become a domain expert in the exciting world of real-time sports data Build a high performing team of your dreams Grow as a leader with our engineering leadership team Shape the culture of our brand-new Wroclaw office Influence the future of Sportradar, you will be directly contributing to products used by our clients in the global sports business Enjoy a high degree of freedom, decide on your own workday, choose methods and solutions that you know will bring the most value Collaborate with colleagues from all over the world (Engineering offices in Europe, Asia and US) Be a part of a company, which culture promotes social aspects, sports, physical exercise, and fun. Competitive salary and benefits  read more
